debates.showAs: Non-Fatal Offences Against the Person (Amendment) Bill 2024: Committee Stage
Non-Fatal Offences Against the Person (Amendment) Bill 2024: Second Stage
Non-Fatal Offences against the Person (Amendment) Bill 2024: First Stage

bill.longTitleEn: Bill entitled an Act to provide for an offence for the action commonly known as catfishing and for that purpose to provide for the identification of such an offence; to amend and extend the Non-Fatal Offences Against the Person Act 1997 and to provide for consequential amendments to the Broadcasting Act 2009; and to provide for related matters.
bill.longTitleGa: Bille dá ngairtear Acht do dhéanamh socrú maidir le cion arb éard é an gníomh ar a dtugtar de ghnáth claonmhealltóireacht ar líne agus, chun na críche sin, do dhéanamh socrú chun cion den sórt sin a shainaithint; do leasú agus do leathnú an Achta um Chionta Neamh-Mharfacha in aghaidh an Duine, 1997 agus do dhéanamh socrú maidir le leasuithe iarmhartacha ar an Acht Craolacháin, 2009; agus do dhéanamh socrú i dtaobh nithe gaolmhara.
bill.shortTitleEn: Non-Fatal Offences Against the Person (Amendment) Bill 2024
bill.shortTitleGa: An Bille um Chionta Neamh-Mharfacha in aghaidh an Duine (Leasú), 2024

debates.showAs: Sale of Tickets (Cultural, Entertainment, Recreational and Sporting Events) (Amendment) (No. 2) Bill 2024: First Stage

bill.longTitleEn: Bill entitled an Act to amend the Sale of Tickets (Cultural, Entertainment, Recreational and Sporting Events) Act 2021 so as to prohibit a primary ticket seller from engaging in dynamic pricing when selling, or advertising for sale, tickets or ticket packages for cultural, entertainment, recreational and sporting events, and to promote fairer access to tickets by prohibiting the sale, or advertising for sale, of tickets or ticket packages for a price that is adjusted or set by dynamic pricing to meet increased demand.
bill.longTitleGa: Bille dá ngairtear Acht do leasú an Achta um Dhíol Ticéad (Imeachtaí Cultúir, Siamsaíochta, Áineasa agus Spóirt), 2021 d’fhonn toirmeasc a chur ar phríomhdhíoltóir ticéad a bheith ag gabháil do phraghsáil dhinimiciúil tráth a bheidh ticéid nó pacáistí ticéad le haghaidh imeachtaí cultúir, siamsaíochta, áineasa agus spóirt á ndíol nó tráth a bheidh ticéid nó pacáistí ticéad le haghaidh imeachtaí den sórt sin á bhfógairt lena ndíol, agus d’fhonn rochtain ar thicéid ar bhonn níos córa a chur chun cinn trí thoirmeasc a chur le ticéid nó le pacáistí ticéad a dhíol, nó le ticéid nó le pacáistí ticéad a fhógairt lena ndíol, ar phraghas a dhéantar a choigeartú nó a shocrú le praghsáil dhinimiciúil chun freastal ar an méadú ar éileamh.
bill.shortTitleEn: Sale of Tickets (Cultural, Entertainment, Recreational and Sporting Events) (Amendment) (No. 2) Bill 2024
bill.shortTitleGa: An Bille um Dhíol Ticéad (Imeachtaí Cultúir, Siamsaíochta, Áineasa agus Spóirt) (Leasú) (Uimh. 2), 2024

debates.showAs: Horticultural Peat (Temporary Measures) Bill 2021: Second Stage
Horticultural Peat (Temporary Measures) Bill 2021: First Stage

bill.longTitleEn: Bill entitled an Act to amend the Planning and Development Acts 2000 to 2021 and the Environmental Protection Agency Acts 1992 to 2011 to make exceptional provision for peat extraction for the purpose of horticulture for a temporary period in the public interest in order to mitigate the adverse consequences resulting, or likely to result from an interruption to supply and to provide for a just transition.
bill.longTitleGa: Bille dá ngairtear Acht do leasú na nAchtanna um Pleanáil agus Forbairt, 2000 go 2021 agus na nAchtanna fán nGníomhaireacht um Chaomhnú Comhshaoil, 1992 go 2011 chun socrú eisceachtúil a dhéanamh maidir le baint móna chun críche gairneoireachta ar feadh tréimhse shealadach ar mhaithe le leas an phobail d’fhonn maolú a dhéanamh ar na hiarmhairtí dochracha a bheidh, nó is dóigh a bheidh, mar thoradh ar bhriseadh ar sholáthar agus do dhéanamh socrú maidir le trasdul cóir.
bill.shortTitleGa: An Bille um Móin Ghairneoireachta (Bearta Sealadacha), 2021

debates.showAs: Clean Air (Smoky Coal Ban) Bill 2021: First Stage

bill.longTitleEn: Bill entitled an Act to provide for the introduction of regulations to prohibit the sale, marketing, distribution and burning of bituminous (smoky) coal on a nationwide basis; and to provide for related matters.
bill.longTitleGa: Bille dá ngairtear Acht do dhéanamh socrú maidir le rialacháin a thabhairt isteach do thoirmeasc gual biotúmanach (toiteach) a dhíol, a mhargú, a dháileadh agus a dhó, ar bhonn náisiúnta; agus do dhéanamh socrú i dtaobh nithe gaolmhara.
bill.shortTitleGa: An Bille um Aer Glan (Cosc ar Ghual Toiteach), 2021

debates.showAs: Climate Action and Low Carbon Development (Emissions Targets) Bill 2018: First Stage

bill.longTitleEn: Bill entitled an Act to amend the Climate Action and Low Carbon Development Act 2015 to specify emissions reduction targets to be achieved and to include these targets in the national mitigation plan and national adaptation framework
bill.longTitleGa: Bille dá ngairtear Acht do leasú an Achta um Ghníomhú ar son na hAeráide agus um Fhorbairt Ísealcharbóin, 2015 chun spriocanna laghdúcháin astuithe a bheidh le baint amach a shonrú agus chun na spriocanna sin a áireamh sa phlean náisiúnta um maolú agus sa chreat náisiúnta oiriúnaithe
bill.shortTitleEn: Climate Action and Low Carbon Development (Emissions Targets) Bill 2018
bill.shortTitleGa: An Bille um Ghníomhú ar son na hAeráide agus um Fhorbairt Ísealcharbóin (Spriocanna maidir le hAstuithe), 2018

debates.showAs: Climate Action and Low Carbon Development (Climate Change Reporting) Bill 2018: First Stage

bill.longTitleEn: Bill entitled an Act to amend the Climate Action and Low-Carbon Development Act 2015 to expand the responsibilities of the Government's climate change advisory council to publish guidance to companies on measuring and reporting their exposure to the risks of climate change and their impacts on the climate.
bill.longTitleGa: Acht do leasú an Achta um Ghníomhú ar son na hAeráide agus um Fhorbairt Ísealcharbhóin, 2015 chun freagrachtaí chomhairle chomhairleach an Rialtais um an athrú aeráide a leathnú d'fhonn treoir a fhoilsiú do chuideachtaí maidir lena risíocht do na priacail i dtaca leis an athrú aeráide agus maidir lena dtionchair ar an aeráid a thomhas agus a thuairisciú.
bill.shortTitleEn: Climate Action and Low Carbon Development (Climate Change Reporting) Bill 2018
bill.shortTitleGa: An Bille um Ghníomhú ar son na hAeráide agus um Fhorbairt Ísealcharbóin (Tuairisciú ar an Athrú Aeráide), 2018

debates.showAs: Planning and Development (Amendment) Bill 2014: First Stage

bill.longTitleEn: Bill entitled an Act to amend Part XVI of the Planning and Development Act 2000 by conferring powers on the Minister for the Environment, Community and Local Government to permit the grant of a licence for events in exceptional circumstances
bill.longTitleGa: Bille dá ngairtear Acht do leasú Chuid XVI den Acht um Pleanáil agus Forbairt, 2000 trí chumhachtaí a thabhairt don Aire Comhshaoil, Pobail agus Rialtais Áitiúil chun deonú ceadúnais le haghaidh ócáidí a cheadú in imthosca eisceachtúla
bill.shortTitleGa: An Bille um Pleanáil agus Forbairt (Leasú), 2014

debates.showAs: Road Traffic Bill 2013: Second Stage [Private Members]
Road Traffic Bill 2013: Referral to Select Committee
Road Traffic Bill 2013: First Stage

bill.longTitleEn: Bill entitled an Act to amend and extend the Road Traffic Acts 1961 to 2010
bill.longTitleGa: Bille dá ngairtear Acht do leasú agus do leathnú na nAchtanna um Thrácht ar Bhóithre, 1961 go 2010
bill.shortTitleGa: An Bille um Thrácht ar Bhóithre, 2013

debates.showAs: State Airports (Amendment) Bill 2012: First Stage

bill.longTitleEn: Bill entitled an Act to amend the State Airports Act 2004, and to provide for matters connected therewith
bill.longTitleGa: Bille dá ngairtear Acht do leasú an Achta um Aerfoirt Stáit, 2004, agus do dhéanamh socrú i dtaobh nithe a bhaineann leis an méid sin

debates.showAs: Motorist Emergency Relief Bill 2012: Second Stage (Resumed)
Motorist Emergency Relief Bill 2012: Second Stage
Motorist Emergency Relief Bill 2012: First Stage

bill.longTitleEn: Bill entitled an Act to allow for the quarterly review of excise duty on petrol and diesel and the introduction of an immediate reduction of 4 cent per litre on the excise duty on petrol and diesel
bill.longTitleGa: Bille dá ngairtear Acht do cheadú athbhreithnithe ráithiúil ar dhleacht mháil ar pheitreal agus ar dhíosal agus laghdú láithreach 4 cent an lítear a thabhairt isteach ar an dleacht mháil ar pheitreal agus ar dhíosal
bill.shortTitleGa: An Bille um Fhaoiseamh Éigeandála do Thiománaithe, 2012

debates.showAs: Electoral (Amendment) (Political Donations) Bill 2011: Second Stage (resumed)
Electoral (Amendment) (Political Donations) Bill 2011: Order for Second Stage
Electoral (Amendment) (Political Donations) Bill 2011: Second Stage

bill.longTitleEn: Bill entitled an Act to restrict the making of donations for political purposes by companies, trade unions, societies or building societies, to amend the law relating to the disclosure of donations to political parties and individuals, to provide for the auditing of the accounts of political parties and to implement the recommendations relating to political funding contained within the Second Report of the Tribunal of Inquiry into Payments to Politicians
bill.longTitleGa: Bille dá ngairtear Acht do chur srian le cuideachtaí, ceardchumainn, cumainn nó cumainn fhoirgníochta do thabhairt síntiús chun críoch polaitíochta, do leasú an dlí a bhaineann le síntiúis le páirtithe polaitíochta agus le pearsana aonair a nochtadh, do dhéanamh socrú maidir le cuntais páirtithe polaitíochta a iniúchadh agus do chur i ngníomh na moltaí a bhaineann le maoiniú polaitíochta atá sa Dara Tuarascáil ón mBinse Fiosrúcháin maidir le hÍocaíochtaí le Polaiteoirí
